topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598195b63687232f70015ac#post_5598195b63687232f70015ac
HORSE the Band are loads of fun to listen to

i love Norma Jean and theyre one of my favorite bands, they really know how to play loads of different sounds within Metalcore and were really diverse, unique, innovative and influential when they first came around, unlike many other Metalcore bands also they manage to throw in some really nice catchy parts without overdoing them. have you ever tried out bands like Converge, Coalesce, Ion Dissonance, The Dillinger Escape Plan and Botch? they play a much more abrasive and dissonant style of Metalcore/Mathcore.
